long_description:
# CaT VoxeLibre Tools
## About
**Tools mod for VoxeLibre. Created and will continue to be developed by YCaTGameRT and farfind. More creative new tools will come later!**
## Special Thanks
### [VoxeLibre](https://content.luanti.org/packages/Wuzzy/mineclone2/)
**VoxeLibre scripts were used to create the mod**
### [Gitea](https://gitea.com)
**The source code is posted on Gitea**
name: cat_voxelibre_tools
short_description: Add tools created by YCaTGameRT and farfind for VoxeLibre
title: CaT VoxeLibre Tools
